episodesJson.title: Love or Whatever
episodesJson.description: This week, we watched the 2012 rom(?)-com(?) Love Or Whatever, the film that dared to ask the question, "can bi people be trusted?" And that also dares to answer the question, "no. They cannot." Also, it dares to ask the question, "what's Meredith from the Office been up?" And the answer to that question will shock you.
topics: People who think puppets are people
How many sex positions are there, exactly?
The Same Girl song doesn't make any sense
